name: Ascendancy
description:
Choose your species, chart your strategy, forge your destiny... it is time to depart this small world. You have imagined your future, and now you will journey byond the orbit of your home planet and discover the mysteries of other worlds.

Ascendancy is your opportunity to explore and settle a galaxy. Using research and resources, you'll design incredible ships, plot fantastic voyages and tempt fate as you explore and battle in distant star systems. As leader of your people, you'll have at your command an impressive arsenal of futuristic weapons and technologies. You alone must decide how to use them. The challenge awaits.
